fields.title: 17th Century Wampanoag Puppets
fields.text: Why not make these simple puppets to tell the story of Thanksgiving? Made with simple shapes to help those learning how to cut.

fields.title: 3D Candle Decoration Made From Fuse Beads
fields.text: This design is made on a small star hama board.

fields.title: ANZAC biscuits
fields.text: An easy to make version of this classic Australian - New Zealand Recipe.

fields.description: Decorate cork coasters in the style of Australian aboriginal dot painting.
fields.title: Aboriginal Dot Painting on Coasters
fields.text: Decorate cork coasters in the style of Australian aboriginal dot painting.

fields.description: The Australian Flag made from hama beads. Uses two large square boards slotted together.
fields.title: Australian Flag in Fuse Beads
fields.text: The Australian Flag made from hama beads. Uses two large square boards slotted together.

fields.description: Australian Guide Uniform in Hama beads
fields.title: Australian Guide Uniform in Fuse Beads
fields.text: Representation of the Australian Guide Uniform (ages 5-10) in fuse beads using the boy and girl hama boards.

fields.title: Australian Guiding Uniform Mini Puppets
fields.text: Colour, cut and stick to make these mini puppets/book marks on lolly sticks.

fields.title: Badger Finger Puppet
fields.text: Use felt and faux fur to make this European Badger finger puppet. Can be done as a cut and stick activity with younger children if body is pre-sewn.

fields.description: Instructions and templates for making balancing butterflies from card and coins.
fields.title: Balancing Butterflies
fields.text: These butterflies balance on their head, making them look as though they're flying. Choose from five template designs.

fields.title: Bat Box Craft
fields.text: Make this bat as a decoration or as a box to hide something special.

fields.title: Beaded Candle Christmas Tree Decoration
fields.text: Make this Christmas tree decoration from tri-beads, 2 pony beads and a pipe cleaner.

fields.title: Beaded Candle and Wreath Christmas Tree Decoration
fields.text: A decoration using small beads and wire.

fields.title: Beaded Candle and Wreath Christmas Tree Decoration
fields.text: A decoration using tri-beads, spherical beads and a pipe cleaner.

fields.title: Beaded Candy Cane
fields.text: Make this simple Christmas tree decoration from tri-beads and a pipe cleaner.

fields.title: Beaded Clacker Instrument
fields.text: A paper plate based junk instrument. Twirl to play. Adult help needed to check the instrument is safe before use.

fields.title: Beaded Icicle or Stalactite
fields.text: A decoration using tri-beads, starflake beads, a round or pony bead and a pipe cleaner.

fields.description: Instructions for making a beaded owl.
fields.title: Beaded Owl
fields.text: Thread beads to make this owl keyring.

fields.description: Instructions for making a 3D spider from beads.
fields.title: Beaded Spider
fields.text: A 3D spider made from 3mm black beads and thin wire. Please note that the instructions do not explain the basics of bead modelling as this activity is intended for people with previous experience.

fields.description: Instructions for making a bird picture from leaf rubbing.
fields.title: Bird Leaf Rubbing Picture
fields.text: Make a bird picture by rubbing leaves.

fields.description: Instructions for icing cookies to show past brownie uniforms.
fields.title: Biscuit Decorating: Past Brownie Uniforms
fields.text: Examples of cookies iced to show some of the different Brownie (UK) uniforms since 1914.

fields.description: Instructions for making brownie (UK) six emblems using biscuits and icing.
fields.title: Biscuit Decorating: Six Emblems
fields.text: Make brownie (UK) six emblems by icing biscuits.

fields.title: Bottletop Castanets
fields.text: Castanets made from a paper plate and bottle tops.

fields.description: Instructions for making a UK brownie uniform and UK brownie promise badge using fuse beads (uniforms require the midi hama girl board).
fields.title: Brownie (UK) Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: Two brownie uniform designs and a promise badge made using the midi hama bead small circular and small girl boards.

fields.description: Instructions for making a butterfly fridge magnet using magnetic craft foam. Includes a pdf template.
fields.title: Butterfly Fridge Magnet
fields.text: A decorative butterfly made from magnetic craft foam.

fields.description: A bingo style game to help children learn more about capuchin monkeys and the problems they experience when people keep them as pets.
fields.title: Capuchin Monkey Bingo
fields.text: This is a bingo style game to help children learn more about capuchin monkeys and consider the problems that exist when people try to keep them as pets. Each template link downloads 6 unique bingo cards. The instructions link includes monkey tokens and other pieces needed to play the game. Please note that the files for this activity are up to 2MB in size.

fields.title: Cardboard Rooster
fields.text: A 3D rooster made from simple shapes cut from card.

fields.title: Cat and Mouse Game
fields.text: A classic brownie game. Ideal for groups of 15+.

fields.description: Instructions for making a blue policebox from a cereal box. (Similar to the one used by Dr Who as a TARDIS.)
fields.title: Cereal Box Blue Policebox
fields.text: This old fashioned style policebox (similar to the one used by Dr Who as a TARDIS) is made from a Quaker cereal box and thick card. This is a tricky craft which requires the use of a craft knife.

fields.description: A template for making a chameleon collage from craft foam and sugar paper.
fields.title: Chameleon Craft Foam Collage
fields.text: Make a Rainforest collage from craft foam and sugar paper.

fields.title: Cheating King Cake
fields.text: Traditional King Cake takes a while to make and tends to be rather large. These cheating king cakes will allow even large groups of children to decorate their own king cake. Simply purchase cinnamon bagels and mix up yellow, green and purple icing.

fields.title: Chick Egg Cosy
fields.text: A simple sewing project for beginners.

fields.description: Instructions for making chocolate fairy cakes.
fields.title: Chocolate Fairy Cake Recipe
fields.text: Instructions for making chocolate fairy cakes.

fields.title: Chocolate Nests
fields.text: A yummy Easter or spring activity.

fields.description: Instructions for making chocolate fairy cakes and turning them into spider cakes.
fields.title: Chocolate Spider Cakes
fields.text: Chocolate flavoured spider cakes made from fairy cakes, minstrels, butter-cream and fondant icing.

fields.description: 11 winter or Christmas themed party games involving running, hunting or dancing.
fields.title: Christmas Party Games
fields.text: 11 winter or Christmas themed party games involving running, hunting or dancing.

fields.title: Christmas Pudding Beaded Serviette Holder
fields.text: A Christmas craft for older children and adults.

fields.title: Christmas Tree Beaded Serviette Holder
fields.text: A Christmas craft for older children and adults.

fields.title: Christmas Tree Decorations using Craft Foam
fields.text: Cut and stick simple shapes from craft foam to make Christmas tree decorations.

fields.title: Christmas Tree Decorations using Craft Foam
fields.text: Cut and stick simple shapes from craft foam to make Christmas tree decorations.

fields.title: Christmas Tree Decorations using Fuse Beads
fields.text: These designs are made on the small circular, heart, star and hexagon hama boards.

fields.title: Christmas and Winter Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: These designs are made using the small square hama board.

fields.title: Christmas and Winter Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: These designs are made on a square large hama board.

fields.description: Instructions for making a bluebell from clay.
fields.title: Clay Bluebell
fields.text: A bluebell made from simple clay shapes.

fields.title: Clay Candy Cane
fields.text: A simple decoration made from red and white clay or coloured salt dough.

fields.description: Instructions for making a carnation from clay.
fields.title: Clay Carnation
fields.text: A carnation made from simple clay shapes.

fields.description: Instructions for making a clay daffodil from clay, salt dough or another modelling material.
fields.title: Clay Daffodil
fields.text: A daffodil made from simple clay shapes.

fields.title: Clay Gargoyle
fields.text: Be inspired by the Gargoyles on Cathedrals like Notre Dame and make your own from air hardening clay. Top: When working with clay start with simple spheres and sausage shapes and then pinch them into the shape you want. You might want to use a clean pencil or blunt knife to help shape the clay. Check with an adult first though - don't use your dinning room knives!

fields.description: Instructions for making a simple clay rose.
fields.title: Clay Rose
fields.text: Attractive and easy to make. Suitable for most forms of clay.

fields.description: Instructions for making a snowdrop from clay.
fields.title: Clay Snowdrop
fields.text: A snowdrop made from simple clay shapes.

fields.title: Cockatoo Sentry Running Game
fields.text: A running game from Australia. Ideal for groups of 8-15 children. Can be played with larger numbers, but a large play space is needed.

fields.description: Templates for making cardboard coiled snakes with life-like markings. Includes template for a Burmese Python, a Rainbow Boa, a Sonoran Mountain King snake and a blank template.
fields.title: Coiled Snakes
fields.text: Coiled snake mobile/decoration made from card. Use the templates to make a Burmese Python, a Rainbow Boa, a Sonoran Mountain King snake or use the blank to make a snake of your own design.

fields.title: Colouring the Sistine Chapel
fields.text: Pictures to colour from the Sistine Chapel Ceiling. Download the instructions to find out more about the actual ceiling and discover a fun way to colour these pictures.

fields.title: Constellation Telescope
fields.text: With this telescope you can see the stars during the day!

fields.description: Instructions for making a crab puppet from paper plates and card.
fields.title: Crab Puppet
fields.text: Make a crab puppet from two paper plates and some orange sugar paper.

fields.title: Craft Foam Dragon Magnet
fields.text: Use magnetic craft foam to make these baby dragons.

fields.title: Craft Foam Ladybird
fields.text: Why not turn this simple ladybird design into a fridge magnet?

fields.title: Craft Foam or Paper Dragon
fields.text: Make this cute dragon from craft foam or colour in the template and turn it into a paper dragon.

fields.title: Czech Shrinkle SWAPs
fields.text: Template to trace the guiding/scouting uniform, promise badge and flag of the Czech Republic onto Shrinkle paper. Can be turned into SWAPs, keyrings, mobile phone charms etc. An adult should supervise the baking of the Shrinkles.

fields.title: Dancing Skeleton
fields.text: Use split pins to attach together, making sure the hole is slightly lose. When you swing your skeleton the arms and legs will sway as though he is dancing.

fields.title: Decorated Chocolate Eggs
fields.text: Decorate chocolate Easter eggs with icing, melted chocolate, sweets and cake decorations. Tip: Chill the eggs in the refrigerator before decorating to help stop them melting.

fields.title: Decorating Wooden Eggs
fields.text: These were made from wooden eggs (purchased from Baker Ross). Paint or (for a more detailed pattern) decorate using metalic pens. When dry add patterns using glitter glue or stick on sequins. Tip: Use small amounts of glitter glue in dots or lines. Large blobs will run and spoil your pattern.

fields.description: Dinosaur themed maths puzzle sheets. Colour the multiples of a given number to reveal a hidden picture.
fields.title: Dinosaur Hidden Pictures
fields.text: Colour the multiples of a given number to reveal 4 hidden creatures from the time of the dinosaurs.

fields.description: Instructions for making Divali related fuse bead designs.
fields.title: Diyas, Rangoli and Lotus Flowers (fuse beads)
fields.text: Instructions for making Divali related fuse bead designs.

fields.title: Dragon Cakes
fields.text: Turn chocolate mini rolls into fire breathing dragons.

fields.title: Dream Catcher (painted on plastic)
fields.text: A dream catcher painted on plastic, surrounded by a wool covered frame.

fields.description: Instructions and templates for making a simple dream catcher by weaving wool through a card template.
fields.title: Dream Catcher (using card)
fields.text: A simplified dream catcher made by weaving wool through a card template. The template includes patterns for a single and double layered version.

fields.title: Easter Bilby Card
fields.text: Thanks to our guiding friend in Australia, we have discovered the Aussie Easter Bilby. Here is a cut and stick card in his honour. If making this with under 7s, we recommend enlarging the template to make it less fiddly.

fields.title: Easter Bunny Cake
fields.text: Make an individual Easter bunny cake.

fields.title: Easter Chick Pop Up Card
fields.text: A simple pop up Easter card.

fields.title: Easter Chick and Rabbit Fridge Magnets
fields.text: Easter fridge magnets made from magnetic craft foam.

fields.description: Instructions for 8 games using chocolate or hen eggs. Ideal for an Easter party.
fields.title: Easter Egg Themed Games
fields.text: Eight games using chocolate or hen eggs. Ideal for an Easter party.

fields.description: A cake made to look like an Australian Echidna.
fields.title: Echidna Cake
fields.text: A cake version of the Australian animal.

fields.title: Edible Dinosaur Picture
fields.text: Play with your food! Make this prehistoric picture from cake, icing, sweets, chocolate, and shredded wheat.

fields.description: Instructions for making an edible dream catcher.
fields.title: Edible Dream Catcher
fields.text: Decorate a biscuit to make an edible dream catcher.

fields.description: Template for making an elephant finger puppet.
fields.title: Elephant Finger Puppet
fields.text: A simple elephant finger puppet made from felt. Can be glued or stitched.

fields.title: Elephant Mask
fields.text: An elephant mask that is easy to cut out.

fields.title: Elephant Parade
fields.text: Cut out your elephant and decorate him using sequins or coloured pens.

fields.title: Emperor Penguins
fields.text: Make a family of Emperor Penguins from paper.

fields.title: Father Christmas Beaded Serviette Holder
fields.text: A Christmas craft for older children and adults.

fields.description: Template and instructions for making a felt Father Christmas finger puppet. Kids craft.
fields.title: Father Christmas Finger Puppet
fields.text: Make your own Father Christmas puppet by sticking or sewing felt pieces together. (Image shows one Father Christmas made by sewing and one by sticking.)

fields.title: Father Christmas Running Game
fields.text: A running game for teams. Teams stand in lines at one end of the hall. The Santa pieces are placed at the other end of the hall (one set per team). Team members take it in turns to run to the other end of the hall and take one Santa piece. The rest of the team try to assemble the pieces. The first team with a completed Father Christmas wins.

fields.title: Fishes Running Game
fields.text: Classic brownie game. Ideal for groups of 12+.

fields.title: Flag of Antigua and Barbuda (Fuse Beads)
fields.text: Create a fuse bead version of the Antigua-Barbuda flag.

fields.title: Flags of Austria, Switzerland, Spain and the Netherlands (fuse beads)

fields.title: Flags of Benin, Burkino Faso, Gambia and the Ivory Coast (fuse beads)

fields.title: Flags of France, Italy, Greece and Germany (fuse beads)
fields.text: Make representations of the flags of France, Italy, Greece and Germany using fuse beads.

fields.title: Flags of Ghana, Nigeria, Sierra Leone and Togo (fuse beads)
fields.text: Make representations of the flags of Ghana, Nigeria, Sierra Leone, and Togo using fuse beads.

fields.title: Flags of Mali, Botswana, South Africa and Namibia (fuse beads)
fields.text: Make representations of the flags of Mali, Botswana, South Africa, and Namibia using fuse beads.

fields.title: Flags of Poland, Hungary, Russia and the Czech Republic (fuse beads)
fields.text: Make representations of the flags of Poland, Hungary, Russia and the Czech Republic using fuse beads.

fields.title: Fox and Rabbit Running Game
fields.text: A group variation on the traditional game of tag.

fields.title: French Guide/Scout Uniform in Fuse Beads
fields.text: Representation of the French SGDF Guide/Scout Uniforms in fuse beads using the boy hama boards.

fields.description: Instructions for making a skeleton and ghost picture using fuse beads. Ideal as a Halloween decoration or card.
fields.title: Fuse Bead Skeleton and Ghost Scene
fields.text: A skeleton and ghost scene made using the large square midi hama bead board. Ideal for Halloween. Please note that this design uses a large board and therefore require patience.

fields.description: 10 games and 4 challenges to try in the dark.
fields.title: Games to Play in the Dark
fields.text: 10 games and 4 challenges to try in the dark.

fields.description: A simple recipe for gingerbread cookies.
fields.title: Gingerbreadmen Recipe
fields.text: Make simple gingerbread biscuits/cookies. If non-animal margarine is used, this recipe is suitable for vegans.

fields.title: Glow in the Dark Snowflake Decoration
fields.text: Make these pretty glow in the dark snowflakes to hang at your window. Four sizes using the small star, large star, small hexagonal and large hexagonal hama bead boards.

fields.title: Glow in the dark Christmas Tree Decorations
fields.text: These designs are made on the small star shaped hama board.

fields.title: Great Barrier Reef Pencil Pot
fields.text: Turn a Pringles tube into a coral reef themed pencil pot - wash it out first though! Use as a stand alone craft or combine with other crafts to make a desk tidy.

fields.description: Finger paint a giant dot painting in the Australian Aboriginal style, telling your own secret story.
fields.title: Group Dot Painting
fields.text: Finger paint a giant dot painting in the Australian Aboriginal style, telling your own secret story.

fields.title: Guiding Doll (pipe cleaners)
fields.text: Make these cute little rainbow, brownie and guide dolls using beads and pipe cleaners.

fields.title: Guiding Uniforms from Antigua and Barbuda (fuse beads)
fields.text: Tweenie, brownie and girl guide uniforms of Antigua and Barbuda, made from fuse beads.

fields.title: Guiding Uniforms from Lebanon (fuse beads)
fields.text: Fuse bead versions of the Farandoles, Jeanette, Guide and Caravelle uniforms from Lebanon.

fields.title: Guiding Uniforms from New Zealand (fuse beads)
fields.text: Fuse bead versions of the Pippin, Brownie, Guide and Ranger uniforms from New Zealand.

fields.description: Instructions for making Halloween biscuits.
fields.title: Halloween Biscuits
fields.text: Decorate biscuits to make Halloween skeletons and spiders.

fields.description: Maths sheets with a Halloween theme.
fields.title: Halloween Hidden Pictures
fields.text: Colour the multiples of a given number to reveal 4 hidden pictures on a Halloween theme.

fields.description: Six Halloween themed games that involve hunting for something and/or solving puzzles.
fields.title: Halloween Party: Hunting and Puzzle Based Games
fields.text: Six Halloween themed games that involve hunting for something and/or solving puzzles.

fields.description: Seven Halloween themed messy party games.
fields.title: Halloween Party: Messy Games
fields.text: Seven Halloween themed messy party games.

fields.description: Nine Halloween themed traditional party games suitable for children's parties.
fields.title: Halloween Party: Themed Traditional Games
fields.text: Nine Halloween themed traditional party games.

fields.title: Halloween salt dough decorations
fields.text: Making halloween decorations from salt dough

fields.description: Instructions and template for painting a peacock based on hand painting.
fields.title: Handprint Peacock
fields.text: Paint a peacock using the wonderfully messy technique of hand-painting.

fields.description: Instructions for creating four heart themed fuse bead designs on hama boards. Ideal for valentine's day, mother's day or as a gift for someone special.
fields.title: Heart Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: Two standard heart designs and one 3D design using the small square hama midi boards and one linked heart design using the small heart shaped board.

fields.description: Instructions for making a hedgehog chocolate cake using 2 large cakes or individual fairy cakes.
fields.title: Hedgehog Cake
fields.text: Make a large party cake or individual fairy cakes into chocolate hedgehogs.

fields.description: Instructions for making a hedgehog picture using leaf rubbing.
fields.title: Hedgehog Leaf Rubbing Picture
fields.text: A hedgehog made from leaf rubbing.

fields.title: Hen Egg Cosy
fields.text: A hand stitched project using simple stitches. Not recommended for beginners.

fields.description: Instructions for making salt dough. Includes a video and a pdf.
fields.title: How to make salt dough

fields.description: Instructions and template for making a simple Jaguar mask.
fields.title: Jaguar Mask
fields.text: A simple Jaguar mask made from card.

fields.description: Instructions for making a generic jellyfish from a paper plate and tissue paper.
fields.title: Jellyfish Paper Plate Craft
fields.text: Make a colourful jellyfish from a paper plate and tissue paper.

fields.description: Kangaroo template. Made from felt, card and a toilet roll inner.
fields.title: Kangaroo Toilet Roll Craft
fields.text: Make your own kangaroo from felt, card and a toilet roll inner. (For anyone worried about health and safety, please take a look at http://www.hse.gov.uk/myth/august.htm)

fields.title: Koala Pot (from fuse beads)
fields.text: Make a Koala Bear fuse bead pot.

fields.title: Krakow Christmas Crib (2D card)
fields.text: This craft is a 2D version of the Krakow Christmas cribs. Cut from gold card and decorate with sequins. We stuck our 'cribs' to wrapping paper for an added festive feel. Google 'Krakow Christmas Crib' to see images of the real thing.

fields.title: Krakow Christmas Crib (to colour)
fields.text: Colour a Krakow Christmas Crib. To see images of the real thing Google 'Krakow Christmas Crib'.

fields.title: Large 3D Christmas Tree
fields.text: This design is made using the large square hama board.

fields.title: Large Beaded Snowflake Christmas Tree Decoration
fields.text: A decoration using small white beads and wire.

fields.title: Lebanon Flag from Fuse Beads (large)
fields.text: The Lebanon flag made with fuse beads. Please note this makes a large flag, requiring plenty of patience!

fields.description: Lemur and Chameleon pictures to trace. Sized for Shrinkle paper.
fields.title: Lemur and Chameleon Shrinkles
fields.text: Use these templates with Shrinkle paper to create keyrings.

fields.description: Instructions for making a lion finger puppet. Glued or stitched.
fields.title: Lion Finger Puppet
fields.text: Make a simple lion finger puppet using felt. Can be stitched or glued.

fields.title: Lolly Pop Ghost
fields.text: Cut 2 squares of white material approximately 10cm x 10cm. Lay them down so that the top piece is rotated 45 degrees to the bottom, giving you 8 points. Place a lolly pop in the centre and gather the material up around it. Tie with a piece of white wool. Stick or draw on eyes and a mouth. To make arms gather up part of the material and tie with more wool.

fields.description: Instructions and play pieces for a game based on endangered and threatened animals from Madagascar.
fields.title: Madagascar Endangered Animal Searching Game
fields.text: In teams search for animals from Madagascar and find out why they are threatened.

fields.title: Making Coloured Rice
fields.text: Pour approximately 100ml of vinegar into a large bowl. Add your desired colour. We used approximately 1 bottle per 6 cups of rice. You can add more or less for darker or pastel colours. Stir in the uncooked rice one cup at a time, making sure the rice is evenly coated. Cover 3-4 baking trays in silver foil. Spread the rice thinly over the foil. Bake at about 50 degrees centigrade for 30 minutes. The rice should be completely dry but not burnt. Leave to cool completely before allowing children to play with the rice. Keep away from moisture.

fields.description: A video and instructions for making a witch from salt dough.
fields.title: Making a salt dough witch
fields.text: Make a witch's head from salt dough.

fields.title: Maori Style Poi
fields.text: Instructions for making your own poi to play with.

fields.title: Maori Ti Rakau
fields.text: Try making and playing this Maori stick game/dance.

fields.title: Maori Tipare Woven Headband
fields.text: This headband is made by plaiting or weaving four strands of card. Once you get the hang of it, it's very simple - but it can be tricky to get started!

fields.title: Mardi Gras Carnival Masks
fields.text: A simple template to decorate as desired.

fields.title: Mardi Gras Jester Badge
fields.text: A beaded badge for Mardi Gras. Requires patience.

fields.title: Mardi Gras Jester Magnet
fields.text: Make a Mardi Gras Jester magnet using craft foam and felt.

fields.description: Turn an old matchbox into a crocodile with a secret draw to keep rubbers, pencil sharpeners or even sweets.
fields.title: Matchbox Crocodile
fields.text: Turn an old matchbox into a crocodile with a secret draw to keep rubbers, pencil sharpeners or even sweets.

fields.title: Mexican God's Eye
fields.text: This beautiful craft is made from thread and two sticks.

fields.description: Instructions for making a fuse bead butterfly, ladybird and bumble bee using the small square and circular hama boards.
fields.title: Minibeasts using Fuse Beads
fields.text: Make a butterfly, ladybird and bumble bee using the small square and circular hama boards.

fields.description: Instructions for making a monkey that holds paper and card (letters, reminder notes, greetings cards etc). Requires adult help for the final stage.
fields.title: Monkey Note Holder
fields.text: Make a craft foam monkey to hold your birthday cards, postcards or as a present for your Mum - great for holding reminder notes.

fields.description: Instructions showing how to make a monster book.
fields.title: Monster Book
fields.text: An easy to make monster book.

fields.description: Instructions showing how to make a moon jellyfish from a paper plate and bin liner.
fields.title: Moon Jellyfish Craft
fields.text: An easy to make puppet or hanging decoration in the style of a Moon Jellyfish.

fields.description: 9 Christmas or winter themed party games involving teamwork and thinking.
fields.title: More Christmas Party Games
fields.text: 9 Christmas or winter themed party games involving teamwork and thinking.

fields.description: Instructions for making four glow in the dark Halloween designs using the small square midi hama boards.
fields.title: More Glow in the Dark Halloween Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: Glow in the dark fuse bead designs using the small square midi hama boards.

fields.description: Instructions for creating glow in the dark Halloween fuse bead designs using the hama hexagonal boards.
fields.title: More Halloween Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: Glow in the dark fuse bead designs using the hexagonal hama boards.

fields.description: Instructions describing how to play a running game called Mother Bird. This game is ideal for class sized groups of children.
fields.title: Mother Bird Team Running Game
fields.text: This is a quick to play running game ideal for large groups of children.

fields.title: Murder Mystery Set on the Orient Express
fields.text: A murder mystery game that lasts about an hour (with suitable acting skills!). We played with this brownies (aged 7+) but it is a 'proper' murder style mystery with slightly adult themes. 7 year olds who watch programs like Eastenders would have no difficulty with the themes. You do however need older girls to lead each group. If playing with a single age group I would not expect 7 year olds to cope.

fields.title: Music Colouring Sheet
fields.text: A music around the world picture to colour. Please note that this picture can be downloaded in two forms, one with an attribution and one without. If you are downloading for your own use, feel free to use either copy. If you pass this on to someone else, you must use the copy that gives the attribution and license details.

fields.description: Make your own nativity finger puppets.
fields.title: Nativity Finger Puppets
fields.text: Make finger puppet versions of Mary and baby Jesus, Joseph, Shepherds, wise men and an angel.

fields.title: Notre Dame Rose Window
fields.text: Use glass paint outliners to trace the design(s) onto an acetate sheet. When dry paint using glass paints to create a pretty stain glass window. Alternatively, simple colour the pattern in.

fields.title: Orient Express Challenge
fields.text: This booklet sets out the Orient Express Challenge. It is based on the major European destinations of the Venice-Simplon Orient Express. As such it covers the UK, France, Austria, Hungary, Turkey, Italy, the Czech Republic and Poland. This challenge is designed to be flexible and you are encouraged to adapt it to suit your needs. Badges can be ordered at a cost of £1 per badge plus p&p. Suggestions for more detailed activities, downloadable craft templates, essential background information and relevant games will appear here over the next few months. UK guiding and scouting units can order the badges by downloading the form above. Others wishing to order badges, please email louise@ideas4kids.org stating where in the world you are (UK, Europe or outside Europe) and how many badges you would like. I will then let you know postage costs and how to order.

fields.title: Orient Express Map Record Sheet
fields.text: A map of the Orient Express destinations with space to record when a challenge has been completed.

fields.description: Instructions for making an owl collage using simple shapes to help develop children's cutting skills.
fields.title: Owl Collage
fields.text: An owl collage made from simple shapes to help develop cutting skills.

fields.description: Template and instructions or an owl themed version of the dice game "beetle".
fields.title: Owl Dice Game
fields.text: An owl themed dice game (in the style of "beetle").

fields.description: Instructions for making a non-sew owl finger puppet.
fields.title: Owl Finger Puppet
fields.text: Make a cute owl finger puppet using felt and glue.

fields.description: Instructions for making four owl fuse beads using the small square hama boards; snowy owl, tawny owl, barn owl and brown owl.
fields.title: Owl Fuse Beads
fields.text: Make a snowy owl, tawny owl, barn owl and brown owl using the small square hama boards.

fields.title: Owl Kite
fields.text: Fly your own owl with this easy to make kite.

fields.title: Painted Skulls
fields.text: Make skull shapes from salt dough (you can do this by hand or by using a skull shaped cookie cutter). Use brightly coloured paint to decorate your skull in the style of the Mexican Day of the Dead.

fields.title: Paper Daisies and Dandelions
fields.text: Cut and stick paper flowers. (Please note that the Daisy is much easier to make than the Dandelion.)

fields.title: Paper Plate Shaker
fields.text: A simple shaker made from rice or dried pulses and a paper plate.

fields.title: Paperclip Rainstick
fields.text: A rainstick made from a kitchen roll inner and paper clips. Fairly simple to make but requires a little patience.

fields.description: A parrot bookmark craft using a lolly stick and card.
fields.title: Parrot Bookmark
fields.text: A small card parrot that can be used as a bookmark.

fields.description: Instructions for making a parrot from leaf rubbing.
fields.title: Parrot Leaf Rubbing Picture
fields.text: Make this parrot by rubbing leaves.

fields.title: Peacock (paper plate/bowl)
fields.text: A simple to make peacock. Colour the pieces, cut them out and stick them onto half a paper bowl (recommended) or half a paper plate.

fields.description: A printable card game to improve memory, based on penguins.
fields.title: Penguin Pairs Game
fields.text: Match pairs of penguins in this memory card game.

fields.title: Pilgrim Puppets
fields.text: Make these simple puppets to celebrate Thanksgiving.

fields.description: Instructions for making pirate fuse beads using the small square hama boards.
fields.title: Pirate Fuse Beads
fields.text: Patterns to make two pirate flags and two pirates using the small square hama boards.

fields.description: Printable cards to make a pirate flag based card game.
fields.title: Pirate Pairs Game
fields.text: Match pirate flags in this memory card game.

fields.description: Pirate skittle game for children with instructions and template.
fields.title: Pirate Skittles
fields.text: A pirate themed game. Aim your cannon ball at enemy ships. Younger children will need adult help to make the skittles.

fields.description: Instructions explaining how to play a pirate themed running game suitable for medium to large groups of children.
fields.title: Pirate Themed Team Running Game
fields.text: This is a pirate themed running game ideal for medium to large groups of children.

fields.description: Instructions for making a spider from a pom-pom and two pipe cleaners.
fields.title: Pom-pom Spider
fields.text: Make a spider from a pom-pom and two pipe cleaners.

fields.title: Promise Badge Fridge Magnet
fields.text: Cut a circle of magnetic craft foam in the colour of your promise badge. Use a pencil to draw on the trefoil (younger girls may need to use an adult prepared template). Go over your pencil markings with pva glue (you need a glue pen or pot with a small nozzle). Sprinkle silver or white glitter over your creation. Shake off the excess glitter and leave to dry.

fields.title: Rabbit Egg Holder
fields.text: A cute bunny egg holder made from craft foam.

fields.title: Rabbit and Chick Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: Easter fuse bead designs using the small square and circular hama boards.

fields.title: Rainbow Dragons
fields.text: Make these pretty baby rainbow coloured dragons. You could use them as finger puppets, desk decorations or hang them up as a mobile.

fields.description: Instructions for making felt elephant toys in rainbow colours.
fields.title: Rainbow Elephant Toys
fields.text: Make these cute and colourful elephant toys from felt.

fields.title: Rainbow Trolls using Craft Foam
fields.text: Cut and stick simple shapes from craft foam to make these cute trolls. Can be turned into a finger puppet if desired.

fields.description: Rangoli style pictures to print and colour.
fields.title: Rangoli Style Pictures to Colour
fields.text: 4 Rangoli style pictures to colour. The easiest has large areas and could be coloured by younger children using crayons. The most complex is very detailed and would be enjoyed by older children.

fields.description: Outline for Rangoli sand picture.
fields.title: Rangoli Style Sand Pictures
fields.text: Add glue and coloured sand or glitter to this template to create your own Rangoli style picture.

fields.title: Reindeer Beaded Serviette Holder
fields.text: A Christmas craft for older children and adults.

fields.description: Template for a reindeer finger puppet made from felt and craft foam.
fields.title: Reindeer Finger Puppet
fields.text: A reindeer finger puppet made from felt and craft foam.

fields.title: Reindeer Models
fields.text: Create your own herd of reindeer using card, a printer, glue and scissors.

fields.description: Instructions for making a ring-tailed lemur puppet from felt and craft foam.
fields.title: Ring-tailed Lemur Puppet
fields.text: Make a ring-tailed lemur puppet using felt and craft foam.

fields.description: Template for making robin finger puppet from felt. Kids craft.
fields.title: Robin Finger Puppet
fields.text: Make this robin finger puppet from simple felt shapes. Can be glued or sewn.

fields.title: Saturn Placemat
fields.text: A simple cut and stick space picture. Laminate to use as a placemat.

fields.title: Saturn Table Decoration
fields.text: Make this space themed table decoration from a polystyrene ball and objects that you would normally throw away.

fields.description: Instructions for making a creature from shells. Easy to make.
fields.title: Shell Clod Hoppers
fields.text: Instructions for making a simple little creature from shells.

fields.description: Instructions for making a shell paper weight using Plaster of Paris.
fields.title: Shell Paper Weight
fields.text: Turn shells collected at the beach into a paper weight.

fields.title: Shrinkle Brownies
fields.text: Hang these brownie tags from your mobile phone, bag, key chain or add beads and a safety pin as an attractive guiding SWAP. An adult should supervise the baking of the shrinkles.

fields.title: Shrinkle Rainbows
fields.text: Hang these rainbow tags from your mobile phone, bag, key chain or add beads and a safety pin as an attractive guiding SWAP. An adult should supervise the baking of the shrinkles.

fields.title: Small 3D Christmas Tree
fields.text: This design is made using a small square hama board.

fields.title: Small Beaded Snowflake Christmas Tree Decoration
fields.text: A decoration using small white beads and wire.

fields.description: Instructions for making a felt frog toy.
fields.title: Small Frog Toy
fields.text: A small frog toy made from felt. The examples are made to look like the Blue and Green Poison Dart Frogs of the Amazonian Rainforest. (They are however larger than the real frogs which are tiny.)

fields.title: Snowman Beaded Serviette Holder (design A)
fields.text: A Christmas or winter craft for older children and adults.

fields.title: Snowman Beaded Serviette Holder (design B)
fields.text: A Christmas or winter craft for older children and adults.

fields.title: Snowman Cake
fields.text: Turn two fairy cakes into a yummy snowman.

fields.description: Instructions for making a snowman finger puppet. Can be glued or sewn. Kids winter craft.
fields.title: Snowman Finger Puppet
fields.text: A simple snowman finger puppet that can be glued or sewn.

fields.description: Fuse bead versions of the South African guiding uniforms using the midi hama bead 'girl' peg board. Part of an intended series of WAGGGS uniforms.
fields.title: South African Guiding Uniforms (Fuse Beads)
fields.text: Fuse bead versions of the South African guiding uniforms (teddies, brownies, guides and rangers) using the midi hama bead 'girl' peg board. Ideal as part of a World Thinking Day celebration or a World Guiding badge.

fields.title: Space Coasters
fields.text: Pictures to print and laminate as coasters for a space themed party, pack holiday etc.

fields.description: Instructions explaining how to play a space station themed running game suitable for small to large groups of children.
fields.title: Space Station Team Running Game
fields.text: In this team based game players are astronauts collecting space debris. Suitable for small to large sized groups.

fields.title: Space Themed Napkin Holder
fields.text: If you're holding a space themed dinner, use the templates provided, or add your own pictures cut from magazines to create themed serviette holders.

fields.description: Instructions for making a spider using an A5 sheet of black card.
fields.title: Spider Made From Card
fields.text: A very simple spider to make from an A5 sheet of black card or paper.

fields.description: Instructions for making a spider from plaited wool.
fields.title: Spider Made From Wool
fields.text: Make a spider by plaiting wool.

fields.description: Recipe for a basic sponge cake with buttercream icing.
fields.title: Sponge Cake Recipe

fields.description: Instructions for playing a squirrel themed team running game. Suitable for small and large groups.
fields.title: Squirrel Team Running Game
fields.text: This is a team based running game with a squirrel theme. Suitable for small to large groups.

fields.title: St George and the Dragon Fuse Beads
fields.text: Celebrate St George's Day by making fuse bead versions of the famous story. Made using the small square hama boards.

fields.title: Star Beaded Serviette Holder
fields.text: A Christmas craft for older children and adults.

fields.title: Star Decoration
fields.text: A decoration made from card. Requires a small amount of sewing.

fields.description: Instructions and template for making a star-fish from card, sand and paint.
fields.title: Star Fish
fields.text: Make a textured star fish from card and sand. The instructions include two different methods of making a star-fish using the template provided.

fields.title: Sugar Skull
fields.text: In Mexico decorated sugar skulls are used as part of the Day of the Dead festival. Make a skull shape from fondant icing or white chocolate moulding paste. Use icing pens and small sweets to decorate.

fields.title: The Union Flag and the flags that make it (fuse beads)
fields.text: Use fuse beads to make the flag of the United Kingdom of Britain and northern Ireland, and the three flags that came together to make it (St Patrick's, St George's and St Andrew's Cross). Note that the union flag requires a large hama board.

fields.title: Turkey Napkin Holder
fields.text: Make these cute Turkey napkin holders. Ideal for Thanksgiving.

fields.title: UK Beaded Flag Badges
fields.text: Make a badge of the Union Jack (UK), St George's (England) and St Andrew's (Scotland) flags from beads and safety pins.

fields.description: Instructions for making three under the sea themed fuse bead designs. Designed to fit the large square, small square and small hexagonal midi hama boards.
fields.title: Under the Sea Themed Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: Make an Octopus on a large hama bead board, a fish on a small square board and a fish bowl scene on a small hexagonal board.

fields.title: Uniform from the Czech Republic (fuse beads)
fields.text: Fuse bead versions of the Guiding and Scouting uniforms from the Czech Republic. Using the boy hama bead boards.

fields.description: Template for a vampire bat finger puppet.
fields.title: Vampire Bat Puppet
fields.text: Make a vampire bat finger puppet. Glued rather than stitched.

fields.description: Instructions for making a lotus flower or water lily from fuse beads.
fields.title: Water Lily or Lotus Flower made from Fuse Beads
fields.text: Make this 3D flower using the large hexagon and small star midi hama bead boards.

fields.description: A template for making a cardboard version of traditional Welsh Love Spoons.
fields.title: Welsh Love Spoons
fields.text: A cardboard version of this traditional Celtic craft. Ideal as a present for someone special.

fields.description: Instructions for making a Welsh flag, Welsh dragon, daffodil and lady in Welsh costume from fuse beads, using the small square and hexagonal hama bead boards.
fields.title: Welsh Symbols using Fuse Beads
fields.text: Great for celebrating St David's Day or as part of a Welsh theme. Made using the small square and hexagonal hama bead boards.

fields.description: Instructions for making a witch and vampire scene using fuse beads.
fields.title: Witch and Vampire Fuse Bead Designs
fields.text: A witch and a vampire scene using the large square midi hama bead boards. Great for making Halloween decorations or cards. Because these designs use the large board they require patience.

fields.description: Instructions explaining how to play a Halloween/witch themed running game suitable for medium to large groups of children.
fields.title: Witch's Cauldron Themed Team Running Game
fields.text: This is a Halloween themed team running game ideal for medium to large groups of children. Similar to 'ladders' but safer and featuring a Halloween story.

fields.description: Instructions for making an Octopus from plaited wool.
fields.title: Wool Octopus
fields.text: An Octopus made from plaited wool.

fields.title: World Music Wordsearch
fields.text: A wordsearch based on music and dance around the world.

fields.title: Woven Bracelet
fields.text: A simple woven bracelet made from hama beads.
